title: Bezin lug = Bezhin meadow
subject_group: Economics, Philosophy, Politics, Religion & Sociology/Communism - Soviet Union

abstract: Note: 'Bezhin Meadow' reconstructed in 1968 by Sergei Yutkevich and Naum Kleimann with music by Sergei Prokofiev
description: Bezhin Meadow' is a reconstruction, using photographs, of a lost, unfinished Eisenstein film from 1935-37. It is set against the background of the collectivisation of agriculture and based on a true story of the death of a young pioneer whose father considered him to be an enemy of his class. Also available on VHS.  Credits: Director, Sergei Eisenstein ; photography, E. Tisse. Note: 'Bezhin Meadow' reconstructed in 1968 by Sergei Yutkevich and Naum Kleimann with music by Sergei Prokofiev
